DOC.detailed_description: To assess quantitative real time PCR result oligonucleotide probes number gene transcription product may useful predictor indicator response celecoxib , feasibility perform six different molecular assay qRTPCR formalin fix paraffin embed tissue obtain breast cancer core biopsy breast cancer reexcision patient , assess change Ki-67 , PCNA , several marker qRTPCR , correlate change expression Ki-67 , PCNA , CAX-2 , bcl-2 , measure immunohistochemistry change measure qRTPCR , determine reliability qRTPCR immunohistochemical assay perform select assay tissue two different institution
